description:
Aerosol process analysis in model-native Spectral Element (SE) grid.  Aerosol Diagnostics on Model Native Grid is a Python-based tool designed for diagnosing aerosol processes in E3SM. It is
particularly designed to analyze simulation data on the model-native spectral element (SE) grid, soit is also known as
Aerosol SE Diagnostics or “asediag”
name: eagles-project/asediag
